node.title: Cosplay Mania 2022 to Host Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie
node.description: Cosplay Mania 2022, an annual cosplay convention in the Philippines, is set to host Hololive Indonesia's Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie this October.
